ui-icon/outlined.description: Outlined icons customize stroke and fill attributes for a light, clean style that works well in dense UIs. The stroke weight of outlined icons can be adjusted to complement or contrast the weight of your typography.

ui-icon/round.description: Rounded icons use a corner radius that pairs well with brands that use heavier typography, curved logos, or circular elements to express their style.

ui-icon/two-tone.description: Two-tone icons have added dimension, using the attributes of stroke, fill, and color. Contrasting stroke and fill colors enables the use of multiple brand colors and can improve legibility.

ui-icon/sharp.description: Sharp icons display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. These rectangular shapes can support brand styles that aren’t well-reflected by rounded shapes.

ui-icon/dark.description: An icon on a light background with a dark foreground color.

ui-icon/light.description: An icon on a dark background with a light foreground color.

ui-icon/inactive.description: An icon is disabled or inactive.

ui-button/outlined.description: Styles an outlined button that is flush with the surface.

ui-button/raised.description: Styles a contained button that is elevated above the surface.

ui-button/unelevated.description: Styles a contained button that is flush with the surface.

ui-button/disabled.description: Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect.

ui-fab/extended.description: Modifies the FAB to wider size which includes a text label.

ui-fab/mini.description: Modifies the FAB to a smaller size.

ui-fab/exited.description: Animates the FAB out of view. When this class is removed, the FAB will return to view.

ui-icon-button/toggle.description: Two icons of the icon button toggle. (Format: `{ on: string, off: string }`)

ui-segmented-buttons/singleSelect.description: To make the segmented button single select.

ui-top-app-bar/content-selector.description: Selector used to style the content below the top app bar, to prevent the top app bar from covering it.

ui-top-app-bar/fixed.description: Fixed top app bars stay at the top of the page and elevate above the content when scrolled.

ui-top-app-bar/dense.description: The dense top app bar is shorter.

ui-top-app-bar/prominent.description: The prominent top app bar is taller.

ui-top-app-bar/prominent-dense.description: The prominent top app bar with dense.

ui-top-app-bar/short.description: Short top app bars are top app bars that can collapse to the navigation icon side when scrolled.

ui-top-app-bar/short-collapsed.description: Short top app bars can be configured to always appear collapsed.

ui-top-app-bar/nav-icon.description: A navigation icon. (Set 'close' for the contextual action bar)

ui-top-app-bar/nav-id.description: Control the navigation drawer is opened or closed.

ui-grid/fixed-column-width.description: Specifies the grid should have fixed column width.

ui-grid/position.description: Specifies the alignment of the whole grid.

ui-grid-cell/columns.description: Specifies the number of columns the cell spans.

ui-grid-cell/order.description: Specifies the order of the cell.

ui-form/item-margin-bottom.description: Sets the form items margin bottom.

ui-form/nowrap.description: Force the <label> text to stay on a single line and ellipse the overflow text.

ui-form/label-top-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a top vertical-aligned label.

ui-form/label-right-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a right text-aligned label.

ui-form/label-top-right-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a top vertical-aligned and right text-aligned label.

ui-form/label-width.description: Sets the horizontal form items' label width.

ui-form/label-margin-right.description: Sets the horizontal form items' label margin right.

ui-form/label-margin-bottom.description: Sets the vertical form items' label margin bottom.

ui-form-field/nowrap.description: Force the text to stay on a single line and ellipse the overflow text.

ui-form-field/align-end.description: Position the input after the label.

ui-form-field/space-between.description: Align the input and label space between.

ui-tabs/stacked.description: Indicates that the tab icon and label should flow vertically instead of horizontally.

ui-tabs/min-width.description: Indicates that the tab should shrink in size to be as narrow as possible without causing text to wrap.

ui-tab/stacked.description: Indicates that the tab icon and label should flow vertically instead of horizontally.

ui-tab/min-width.description: Indicates that the tab should shrink in size to be as narrow as possible without causing text to wrap.

ui-tab-indicator/fade.description: Sets up the tab indicator to fade in on activation and fade out on deactivation.

ui-menu-anchor/position.description: Menu button position to the menu anchor.

ui-menu-anchor/absolute.description: The menu surface can use absolute positioning when being displayed. This requires that the element containing the menu has the `position: relative` style.

ui-menu/position.description: Menu position to the menu button.

ui-menu/distance.description: Anchor margin. (Format: `{ top, right, bottom, left }`)

ui-menu/fixed.description: Used to indicate that the menu is using fixed positioning.

ui-menu/fullwidth.description: Sets the menu surface's width to match that of its parent anchor. Do not use with `fixed` or if hoisting to body.

ui-menuitem/nested.description: Used to wrap a group of <ui-menuitem> that will represent a selection group.

ui-menuitem/selected.description: Used to indicate which element in an item group is selected.

ui-pagination/total.description: The total number of data items.

ui-pagination/page-span.description: Display the first N pages of the current page. (MIN VALUE: 3)

ui-pagination/page-size.description: The number of data items per page.

ui-pagination/show-jumper.description: Determine whether you can jump to pages directly.

ui-textfield/outlined.description: Styles the text field as an outlined text field. (`label` or `placeholder` required)

ui-textfield/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-textfield/label.description: A text caption or description for the text field, which use the input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

ui-textfield/disabled.description: Styles the text field as a disabled text field.

ui-textfield/required.description: Styles the text field as a required text field.

ui-textfield/fullwidth.description: Styles the text field as a full width text field.

ui-textfield/end-aligned.description: Styles the text field with an end-aligned input.

ui-textfield/icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

ui-textfield/with-leading-icon.description: Styles the text field as a text field with a leading icon.

ui-textfield/with-trailing-icon.description: Styles the text field as a text field with a trailing icon.

ui-textfield/prefix-text.description: Sets the text content of the prefix.

ui-textfield/suffix-text.description: Sets the text content of the suffix.

ui-textfield/with-counter.description: Styles the text area as a text area with an internal character counter.

ui-textfield/helper-text-id.description: Required for the id attribute of the <ui-textfield-helper>.

ui-textfield/pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against

ui-textfield/minlength.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in an <input> element

ui-textfield/maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element

ui-textfield/min.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element

ui-textfield/max.description: Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element

ui-textfield/step.description: Specifies the interval between legal numbers in an input field

ui-textfield/rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area

ui-textfield/cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area

ui-textfield-helper/valid-msg.description: Indicates the helper text is a validation message.

ui-textfield-helper/visible.description: Makes the helper text permanently visible.

ui-autocomplete/outlined.description: Styles the autocomplete as an outlined text field. (`label` or `placeholder` required)

ui-autocomplete/source.description: Defines the data to use, must be specified.

ui-autocomplete/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-autocomplete/label.description: A text caption or description for the autocomplete, which use the input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

ui-autocomplete/disabled.description: Styles the autocomplete as a disabled text field.

ui-autocomplete/required.description: Styles the autocomplete as a required text field.

ui-autocomplete/autofocus.description: If set to `true` the first item will automatically be focused when the menu is shown.

ui-autocomplete/delay.description: The delay in milliseconds between when a keystroke occurs and when a search is performed. A zero-delay makes sense for local data (more responsive), but can produce a lot of load for remote data, while being less responsive.

ui-autocomplete/minlength.description: The minimum number of characters a user must type before a search is performed. Zero is useful for local data with just a few items, but a higher value should be used when a single character search could match a few thousand items.

ui-autocomplete/remote.description: Get data by AJAX. Default usage for local data.

ui-autocomplete/highlight.description: Styles the autocomplete suggestion value as a strong text.

ui-autocomplete/fullwidth.description: Styles the autocomplete as a full width text field.

ui-autocomplete/end-aligned.description: Styles the autocomplete with an end-aligned input.

ui-autocomplete/icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

ui-autocomplete/with-leading-icon.description: Styles the autocomplete as a text field with a leading icon.

ui-autocomplete/with-trailing-icon.description: Styles the autocomplete as a text field with a trailing icon.

ui-select/outlined.description: Styles the select as an outlined select.

ui-select/model-value.description: The value of the currently selected option.

ui-select/options.description: An array of options to show to the user.

ui-select/label.description: A text caption or description for the select.

ui-select/fullwidth.description: Styles the select as full width select.

ui-select/fixed.description: Styles the select as fixed select.

ui-select/icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

ui-select/with-leading-icon.description: Styles the select as a select with a leading icon.

ui-select/helper-text-id.description: Required for the id attribute of the <ui-select-helper>.

ui-select-helper/valid-msg.description: Indicates the helper text is a validation message.

ui-select-helper/visible.description: Makes the helper text permanently visible.

ui-checkbox/indeterminate.description: Styles the checkbox as an indeterminate checkbox.

ui-checkbox/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-checkbox/disabled.description: Styles the checkbox as a disabled checkbox.

ui-radio/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-radio/disabled.description: Styles the radio button as a disabled radio button.

ui-chips/model-value.description: Single or multiple selection from a set of options.

ui-chips/options.description: An array of options to show to the user. Applicable only for choice or filter chips.

ui-chips/chips.description: A set of chips. Applicable only for updating the input chips.

ui-chip/selected.description: Hides the leading icon in a filter chip when the chip is selected.

ui-chip/removable.description: Indicates a trailing icon which removes the chip from the DOM. Only use with input chips.

ui-file/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-file/accept.description: File types that can be accepted.

ui-file/multiple.description: Whether to support selected multiple file.

ui-file/outlined.description: Styles an outlined upload button that is flush with the surface.

ui-file/text.description: Text for the default upload button.

ui-datepicker/outlined.description: Styles the datepicker as an outlined text field. (label or placeholder required)

ui-datepicker/input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

ui-datepicker/label.description: A text caption or description for the datepicker, which use the input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

ui-datepicker/disabled.description: Styles the datepicker as a disabled text field.

ui-datepicker/required.description: Styles the datepicker as a required text field.

ui-datepicker/fullwidth.description: Styles the datepicker as a full width text field.

ui-datepicker/end-aligned.description: Styles the datepicker with an end-aligned input.

ui-datepicker/icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

ui-datepicker/with-leading-icon.description: Styles the datepicker as a text field with a leading icon. (Use with `before` slot)

ui-datepicker/with-trailing-icon.description: Styles the datepicker as a text field with a trailing icon. (Use with `after` slot)

ui-rangepicker/outlined.description: Styles the rangepicker as an outlined text field. (labels or placeholders required)

ui-rangepicker/labels.description: A text caption or description for the rangepicker, which use the start and end input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

ui-rangepicker/placeholders.description: The placeholder attribute of the start and end <input>.

ui-rangepicker/disabled.description: Styles the rangepicker as a disabled text field.

ui-switch/disabled.description: Styles the switch as a disabled switch.

ui-slider/discrete.description: Styles the slider as a discrete slider.

ui-slider/with-tick-marks.description: Discrete sliders support display markers on their tracks.

ui-slider/model-value.description: The current value of the slider. (Array value for range slider)

ui-slider/min.description: The minimum value a slider can have.

ui-slider/max.description: The maximum value a slider can have.

ui-slider/step.description: Specifies the increments at which a slider value can be set.

ui-slider/disabled.description: Whether or not the slider is disabled.

ui-list/single-selection.description: The list can handle selecting/deselecting list elements based on click or keyboard action.

ui-list/model-value.description: The index of the selected list item. Applicable only for the single selection list.

ui-list/dense.description: Styles the density of the list, making it appear more compact.

ui-list/avatar.description: Configures the leading tiles of each row to display images instead of icons. This will make the graphics of the list items larger.

ui-nav/single-selection.description: The list can handle selecting/deselecting list elements based on click or keyboard action.

ui-nav/model-value.description: The index of the selected list item. Applicable only for the single selection list.

ui-nav/dense.description: Styles the density of the list, making it appear more compact.

ui-nav/avatar.description: Configures the leading tiles of each row to display images instead of icons. This will make the graphics of the list items larger.

ui-item/selected.description: Styles the row in an selected state.

ui-item/disabled.description: Styles the row in an disabled state.

ui-nav-item/href.description: Resolved url. This would be the `href` attribute of an `a` element.

ui-nav-item/active.description: Styles the row in an activated state.

ui-list-divider/padded.description: Leaves gaps on each side of divider to match padding of the last tile.

ui-list-divider/inset.description: Increases the leading margin of the divider so that it does not intersect the avatar column.

ui-item-divider/padded.description: Leaves gaps on each side of divider to match padding of the last tile.

ui-item-divider/inset.description: Increases the leading margin of the divider so that it does not intersect the avatar column.

ui-image-list/masonry.description: Indicates that this Image List should use the Masonry variant.

ui-image-list/text-protection.description: Indicates that supporting content should be positioned in a scrim overlaying each image (instead of positioned separately under each image).

ui-image-item/image.description: Add the `src` attribute directly to the in the image container.

ui-card/outlined.description: Removes the shadow and displays a hairline outline instead.

ui-card-media/square.description: Automatically scales the media area's height to equal its width.

ui-card-media/rectangle.description: Automatically scales the media area's height according to its width, maintaining a 16:9 aspect ratio.

ui-card-actions/full-bleed.description: Removes the action area's padding and causes its only child (a `mdc-card__action` element) to consume 100% of the action area's width

ui-table/fullwidth.description: Styles the table as a full width table.

ui-table/selected-key.description: The `model-value` use custom key field, default use row index.

ui-table/row-id-prefix.description: The prefix of `data-row-id` attribute value on row element `tr`.

ui-table/sort-icon-align-end.description: The sort icon will be positioned after the label.

ui-table/show-progress.description: Styles the table with progress indicator for data loading.

ui-table/fixed-header.description: Styles the table as a fixed header.

ui-table/default-col-width.description: Set the default column width for the fixed table.

ui-table/scroll.description: Set the table container size for the fixed table.

ui-badge/overlap.description: Make the badge overlap with its container.

ui-badge/dot.description: Whether to display a dot instead of `count`.

ui-dialog/escape-key.description: Sets the action reflected when the Escape key is pressed. Setting to `false` disables closing the dialog via Escape key.

ui-dialog/closable.description: Closes the dialog, when a user actions on the accept or cancel button.

ui-dialog/mask-closable.description: Closes the dialog, when the dialog scrim is clicked.

ui-dialog/reset-scroll.description: Reset scroll bar, when the dialog is closed.

ui-dialog/scrollable.description: Applied automatically when the dialog has overflowing content to warrant scrolling.

ui-dialog/stacked.description: Applied automatically when the dialog's action buttons can't fit on a single line and must be stacked.

ui-dialog/fullscreen.description: Styles a full-screen dialog for mobile/small-screen devices.

ui-snackbar/action-type.description: Sets action button or dismiss icon for the snackbar. (0: action button, 1: dismiss icon)

ui-snackbar/timeout-ms.description: The automatic dismiss timeout in milliseconds. Value must be between 4000 and 10000 or an error will be thrown.

ui-snackbar/action-button-text.description: The action button/icon elements, if present.

ui-snackbar/stacked.description: Positions the action button/icon below the message instead of alongside it.

ui-snackbar/leading.description: Positions the snackbar on the leading edge of the screen (left in LTR, right in RTL) instead of centered. (tablet and desktop only)

ui-banner/centered.description: Displayed centered. By default, banners are positioned as leading.

ui-banner/fixed.description: When used below top app bars, banners should remain fixed at the top of the screen.

ui-banner/with-image.description: Images can help communicate a banner’s message.

ui-banner/mobile-stacked.description: On mobile view, banners with long text should have their action(s) be positioned below the text instead of alongside it.

ui-progress/active.description: Puts the linear progress indicator in an indeterminate state.

ui-progress/progress.description: Sets the progress bar to this value. Value should be between [0, 1].

ui-progress/buffer.description: Sets the buffer bar to this value. Value should be between [0, 1].

ui-progress/label.description: Label indicating how the progress bar should be announced to the user.

ui-spinner/active.description: Puts the circular progress indicator in an indeterminate state.

ui-spinner/progress.description: Sets the progress bar to this value. Value should be between [0, 1].

ui-spinner/size.description: To set the circular progress size.

ui-spinner/four-colored.description: You may choose to have the indicator in inderminate state animate through 4 colors.

ui-spinner/label.description: Label indicating how the progress bar should be announced to the user.

ui-editor/placeholder.description: Placeholder text to show when editor is empty.

ui-editor/readonly.description: Whether to instantiate the editor to read-only mode.

ui-editor/toolbar-options.description: Custom toolbar options of the Font Famliy, Font Size and Line Height.

ui-editor/emotions.description: The emoticon extension. Supports emoji and image.

ui-editor/with-counter.description: Styles the editor with an internal character counter.

ui-tree/data-format.description: Defines the tree data source format.

ui-tree/max-level.description: Set max level for tree nodes.

ui-tree/multiple.description: Whether to support selected multiple tree nodes.

ui-tree/single-checked.description: Set single checked. Applicable only for the multiple tree.

ui-tree/auto-expand-parent.description: Whether to automatically expand root parent(s) treeNode.

ui-tree/default-expanded-keys.description: Specify the node keys of the default expanded treeNodes.

ui-bottom-navigation/content-selector.description: Selector used to style the content above the bottom navigation, to prevent the bottom navigation from covering it.

ui-bottom-navigation/stacked.description: Indicates that the tab icon and label should flow vertically instead of horizontally.
